item.name: Peos Estate
item.description: The Peos family has farmed the West Manjimup district for over 50 years,the third generation of four brothers commencing the development of the vineyard in 1996; there is a little over 36ha of vines, with shiraz (10ha), merlot (6.8ha), chardonnay (6.7ha), cabernet sauvignon (4ha), sauvignon blanc (3ha), and pinot noir and verdelho (2ha each). Exports to the US, Canada, Denmark, Switzerland, Singapore and China.
